tgt_text: emva kokuba kufunyaniswe ukuba bosulelekile, bonke bazigcina bucala ekhaya.

src_text: ka morago ga gore diteko di laetše gore o na le baerase ye, boraro bja bona ka moka ba ile ba ipeela thoko ka gae gore ba se kopane le batho ba bangwe.
tgt_text: "sazivalela kwigumbi lethu lokulala, ngelixa umazala wam onesifo seswekile kunye noxinzelelo lwegazi kwaye ngethamsanqa zange osuleleke yintsholongwane – yena wayekhathalela abanye babantwana bethu ababini," utsho umohammed.

src_text: "re ile ra ipeela thoko ka phapošing ya rena ya go robalela, mola e le gore matswale yena – yo a nago le bolwetši bja swikiri le bolwetši bja madi a magolo ka mahlatse a se a fetelwa ke baerase ye – a ile a hlokomela bana ba rena ba babedi," gwa bolela mohammed.
tgt_text: ngokwesebe lezempilo lasentshona koloni, abantu abanoxinzelelo lwegazi, abanesifo seswekile kunye nesifo sezintso esinganyangekiyo baphakathi kwabantu abanezifo ezinganyangekiyo abangabona bahlaselwa lula yicovid19.

src_text: go ya ka kgoro ya maphelo ya kapa bodikela, batho bao ba nago le bolwetši bja madi a magolo, ba bolwetši bja swikiri le ba bolwetši bja dipshio bja go se fole ke bao ka tllwaelo ba tshenywago ke covid19.
tgt_text: ukususela kumhla wama25 kucanzibe, abantu abanezi zigulo zilandelayo babonisa iimpawu ezinobuzaza: uxinzelelo lwegazi, iipesenti ezingama58 isifo seswekile, iipesenti ezingama56 isifo sezintso esinganyangekiyo, iipesenti ezili17 isandulelangculazi (ihiv), iipesenti ezili16 isifo sombefu okanye isifo esinganyangekiyo sesifuba, iipesenti ezili15 isifo sentliziyo, iipesenti ezili11 ukutyeba kakhulu, iipesenti ezili13 isifo sephepha, iipesenti ezili13 isifo somhlaza, iipesenti ezimbini ezinye izigulo ezinganyangekiyo, iipesenti ezili16.

src_text: go thoma ka la 25 mopitlo, batho bao ba nago le malwetši ao a latelago a go iphihla ba laeditše maswao a kotsi: bolwetši bja madi a magolo, 58% bolwetši bja swikiri, 56% bolwetši bja dipshio bja go se fole, 17% hiv , 16% asema goba bolwetši bja go hema bja go se fole, 15% bolwetši bja pelo, 11% mmele o mogolo, 13% tb, 13% kankere, 2% malwetši a mangwe a go se fole, 16%.
tgt_text: umohammed uthi eyona nto yayimoyikisa kakhulu yayiliphika elalibangelwa yicovid19.

src_text: mohammed o bolela gore letšhogo la gagwe le legolo e bile ge a hlakahlakana a palelwa ke go hema ka lebaka la covid19.
tgt_text: "bendisiva ukudinwa kakhulu, ukukhohlela nokuminxeka kwesifuba, inqawe yam yombefu ibikunceda oku.

src_text: "ke ile ka itemogela go lapa, go gohlola le go ngangega ga maswafo, fao go ilego gwa rarollwa ke pompi ya ka ya asema.
tgt_text: iimpawu zam zazingena buzaza kakhulu njengezomyeni wam, ebenomzimba obuhlungu, enesicafucafu, isifuba esivalekileyo, ukuphelelwa ngumoya, ukuvaleka kwempumlo namarhanana, izikhohlela ezisesifubeni sakhe kunye nomkhuhlane.

src_text: maswao a ka ga se a mpefala go swana le a monna wa ka, yo a ilego a ba le dihlabi mmeleng, a sellega, a ba le maswafo a go ngangega, go felelwa ke moya, disaenase tše di thibanego, sehuba se sekoto mafahleng a gagwe le go ﬁ ša ga mmele.
tgt_text: unyana wam ebenomkhuhlane iintsuku ezintathu, kodwa waphila ngokukhawuleza nje zakuba ziphelile iimpawu," utshilo.

src_text: morwa wa ka o bile le go ﬁ ša ga mmele matšatši a mararo, eupša o ile a fola ka pela kudu ge a se na go fenya maswao a gagwe," a realo.
tgt_text: usapho lwakamohammed beluthobele iinkqubo zococeko emsebenzini nasekhaya, ukuphepha ukosuleleka yintsholongwane.

src_text: ba lapa la bo mohammed ba ile ba obamela ditshepedišo ka moka tša pabalelo ya maphelo ka mošomong le ka gae, go efoga gore ba se ke ba fetelwa ke baerase.
tgt_text: "usapho lwam beluqonda, lukhathala kwaye lusixhasa, kwaye belusiphathela isidlo sangokuhlwa rhoqo ebusuku, kodwa ngamanye amaxesha abantu basekuhlaleni basenokungakhathali kwaye ubuhlungu obenziwa kumakhasi onxibelelwano oluntu buyoyikeka," utsho umohammed.

src_text: "ba lapa la ka ba be ba kwešiša, ba kgathala ebile ba na le thekgo, gomme ba re tlišetša dijo tša mantšiboa bošegong bjo bongwe le bjo bongwe, eupša ka dinako tše dingwe setšhaba sa geno se ka no se kgathale ka wena gomme tshenyo ye e bakwago ke kgašo ya setšhaba e a tšhoša," gwa bolela mohammed.
tgt_text: isebe lezempilo lasentshona koloni lithi ukuzigcina usela amanzi rhoqo kunye nokujonga iglucose egazini lakho, uxinzelelo lwegazi kunye neqondo lobushushu emzimbeni zizinto eziphambili ekulawuleni icovid19, ingakumbi kubantu abanezigulo ezinganyangekiyo.

src_text: kgoro ya maphelo ya kapa bodikela e bolela gore go dula o nwele meetse le go hlokomela tlelukhose ya gago ya ka mading le thempheretšha ya mmeleng go bohlokwa go laola covid19, kudukudu go balwetši bao ba nago le malwetši a go iphihla.
tgt_text: ukongeza, isebe licebisa abantu abanezigulo ezinganyangekiyo: ukusela amayeza akho ngokuchanekileyo, njengoko kuchaziwe ngugqirha wezempilo.

src_text: godimo ga fao, kgoro ye e eletša batho bao ba nago le malwetši a go iphihla: go nwa dihlare ka maleba, go ya ka fao ba laetšwego ke mošomi wa tlhokomelo ya maphelo.
tgt_text: ukuhlamba izandla zakho ngesepha namanzi ubuncinane imizuzwana engama20, ngaphambi kokuphatha naliphi na iyeza.

src_text: go hlapa diatla tša bona ka sesepa le meetse bonyane metsotswana ye 20, pele ga ge o ka kgoma dihlare.
tgt_text: ukungayeki ukusela iyeza ngaphandle kokuba uxelelwe ngugqirha wezempilo kwaye ungaze wabelane nomnye umntu ngamayeza.

src_text: go se emiši go nwa dihlare ka ntle le ge mošomi wa tlhokomelo ya maphelo a go botša gore o emiše go di nwa ebile o se fane ka dihlare tšeo le motho yo mongwe.
tgt_text: ukuzama ukuzivocavoca imizuzu engama30 ngosuku.

src_text: go leka go itšhidulla metsotso ye 30 ka letšatši.
tgt_text: isebe lithi abantu abanesifo seswekile banamathuba amaninzi okufumana iingxaki ezinzima kwicovid19, kodwa umngcipheko wokugula kakhulu uphantsi ukuba isifo seswekile siyalawuleka.

src_text: kgoro e bolela gore batho bao ba nago le bolwetši bja swikiri ba na le sebaka se segolo sa go itemogela go hlakahlakana ga bolwetši ka lebaka la covid19, eupša kotsi ya go babja kudu e fasana ge e le gore bolwetši bja swikiri bja motho bo laolega gabotse.
tgt_text: "ngokubanzi, abantu abanesifo seswekile ngabona banokuba neempawu eziqatha nezinzima xa bosulelwe yintsholongwane.

src_text: "ka kakaretšo, batho bao ba nago le bolwetši bja swikiri go na le kgonagalo ye kgolo ya go itemogela maswao ao a mpefetšego kudu le go hlakahlakana ga bolwetši ge ba ka fetelwa ke baerase ye.
tgt_text: njengoko abantu abanesifo seswekile besebungozini becovid19 eqatha nje, ukungasondelelani nabantu okanye ukubambana kuyacetyiswa apho kukho imfuneko khona.

src_text: ka ge batho bao ba nago le bolwetši bja swikiri ba le kotsing ye kgolo ya gore covid19 e ka mpefala, go tšwela pele go tlogela sekgoba gareng ga batho go a šišinywa ge go kgonagala.
tgt_text: ukutyeba nako kungumngcipheko oqatha wecovid19.

src_text: go ba le mmele o mogolo le gona go kotsi gore covid19 e ka mpefala.
tgt_text: ukuthoba ubunzima bomzimba, ukuba kuyenzeka kuyakhuthazwa.

src_text: go sesefala mmeleng, ge go kgonagala, ka fao go a šišinywa.
tgt_text: ukuba ngumqabaqaba emva kokuzigcina bucala iintsuku ezili14, umohammed wabuyela emsebenzini.

src_text: "go phela gabotse mmelengka morago ga go dula a nnoši mo matšatšing a 14, mohammed o ile a boela mošomong.
tgt_text: uthi ukuphila kwakhe emva kwentsholongwane kuyitshintshile inkqubo yokucinga kunye nemibono yakhe ngobomi.

src_text: o bolela gore go fola go baerase ye go ile gwa fetoša ka fao a naganago ka gona le ka fao a bonago bophelo ka gona.
tgt_text: "ukuqonda kakhulu ukubaluleka koosapho lwakho kunye nezinto ezincinci ebomini.

src_text: "o bona bohlokwa bja ba lapa la gago le dilo tše nnyane bophelong.
tgt_text: ndifuna abantu nakweyiphi indawo abasebenza kuyo bathathe uxanduva ngeempilo zabo kwaye bafundise iintsapho zabo nabantwana babo, ingakumbi njengokuba abantwana bebuyele esikolweni.

src_text: ke nyaka batho ka seemong sefe goba sefe sa mošomo go rwala maikarabelo go maphelo a bona le go ruta ba malapa a bona le bana ba bona, kudukudu ka gore mo lebakeng le bana ba boetše sekolong.
tgt_text: "nceda umntwana wakho afumane iindlela ezinobuchule ngokubonisa uthando kwizihlobo zabo, ngaphandle kokusondelelana kunye nokubambana.

src_text: "thuša ngwana wa gago go hwetša ditsela tša boithomelo tša go laetša lerato go bagwera ba gagwe, ka ntle le go batamela le go kgoma batho ba bangwe.
tgt_text: yenza usapho lwakho luzicoce ngesibulalantsholongwane ngaphambi kokuba lungene endlwini, lushiye izihlangu zalo egaraji ukuba luyakwazi, khulula zonke iimpahla zakho uze uhlambe ngaphambi kokubulisa usapho lwakho futhi qaphela impilo ukuze ubakhusele," utsho.

src_text: botša ba lapa la gago gore ba tloše ditwatši go bona pele ga ge ba tsena ka gae, tlogela dieta tša gago ka karatšheng ge o ka kgona, apola diaparo tša gago ka moka gomme o hlape mmele pele ga ge o dumediša ba lapa la gago gomme o hlokomele tša maphelo kudu gore o ba šireletše," a realo.
tgt_text: isebe licebisa abantu abanezigulo ezinganyangekiyo ukuba batye ukutya okusempilweni, bazivocavoce rhoqo, bangazifukami izinto ezibakhathaza umphefumlo, basebenzise okanye basele amayeza ngokufanelekileyo baze balandele onke amanyathelo othintelo ayimfuneko.

src_text: kgoro e eletša batho bao ba nago le malwetši a go iphihla go ja dijo tša phepo, ba itšhidulle kgafetšakgafetša, ba laole kgatelelo ya bona ya monagano, ba obamele leano la bona la kalafo ya maphelo le go latela magato ka moka a thibelo ya malwetši.
tgt_text: vnqa zange osuleleke yintsholongwane – yena wayekhathalela abanye babantwana bethu ababini," utsho umohammed.

src_text: vbolwetši bja madi a magolo ka mahlatse a se a fetelwa ke baerase ye – a ile a hlokomela bana ba rena ba babedi," gwa bolela mohammed.
tgt_text: ngokwesebe lezempilo lasentshona koloni, abantu abanoxinzelelo lwegazi, abanesifo seswekile kunye nesifo sezi ukutyeba kakhulu, iipesenti ezili13 kunye nomkhuhlane.

src_text: a fola ka pela kudu ge a se na go fenya maswao a gagwe," a realo.
tgt_text: unyana wam ebenomkhuhlane iintsuku ezintathu, kodwa waphila ngokukhawuleza nje zakuba ziphelile iimpawu," utshilo.

src_text: ba lapa la bo mohammed ba ile ba obamela ditshepedišo ka moka tša pabalelo ya maphelo ka mošomong le ka gae, go efoga gore ba se ke ba fetelwa ke baerase.
tgt_text: usapho lwakamohammed beluthobele iinkqubo zococeko emsebenzini nasekhaya, ukuphepha ukosuleleka yintsholongwane.

src_text: "ba lapa la ka ba be ba kwešiša, ba kgathala ebile ba na le thekgo, gomme ba re tlišetša dijo tša mantšiboa bošegong bjo bongwe le bjo bongwe, eupša ka dinako tše dingwe setšhaba sa geno se ka no insaaf mohammed, yo a nago le asema, o kgonne go fenya covid19 ge e le gore o na le maswao afe goba afe a bolwetši, a go swana le go ﬁ ša ga mmele, go gohlola, goba go felelwa ke moya, ikgokaganye le mogala wa go se lefelwe wa covid19 mo go 0800 029 999 goba romela lentšu le ‘hi’ go 0600 123 456
tgt_text: umama onesigulo esinganyangekiyo uyoyisile icovid19 silusapho nyanda uinsaaf mohammed uthi kubaluleke kakhulu ukuba abemi bomzantsi afrika ingakumbi abo banezigulo ezinganyangekiyo ukuba bathathe uxanduva lwempilo yabo.

src_text: re gopola bašomedi ba rena ba tlhokomelo ya maphelo vukuzenzele unnamed palo ya moragorago ya mahu a go hlolwa ke coronavirus e fetile 2 000. godimo go bao ba lobilego maphelo a bona ke bašomedi ba tša maphelo, ditsebi tša go hloka bosodi mešomong ya bona bao ba hlokometšego bao ba lwalago, ebile e be e le bona ba thekgago le go homotša bao ba lego maokelong ba beetšwe thoko le ba malapa a bona.
tgt_text: imbeko ekhethekileyo kubasebenzi bethu benkathalelo yezempilo vukuzenzele unnamed inani lokusweleka okubangelwa yintsho longwane icorona kutsha nje lide ledlula kuphawu lwama2 000. phakathi kwabo bathe baphulukana nobomi babo ngabasebenzi bezempilo, abasebenzi abafezekileyo abebekhathalela abagulayo, kwaye bebeyinkxaso nentuthuzelo kwabo bebesesibhedlele besenziwa amakheswa kwiintsapho zabo.

src_text: gore banna le basadi bao ba rwelego mošomo wo o bohlokwa wa go kgethega magetleng a bona ke bona bao ba fetelwago ke bolwetši bjo le go hlokagala ke taba ye hlobaetšago kudu.
tgt_text: le yokuba amadoda naba setyhini benza le misebenzi iphakamileyo nendilisekile kangaka babe bona kuqala begula bade basweleke sisithonga esibuhlungu eso.

src_text: ke bona batho ba matho mothomo ba go phenkgišana le leuba le.
tgt_text: ngabo abangabona baphambili edabini lokulwa nalo bhubhane.

src_text: ba šoma ka tlase ga kgatelelo ye kgolo ebile ba swanela ke go dula ba tshwenyegile megopolong ka ge ba tseba gore ba kotsing ya go fetelwa ke baerase ye.
tgt_text: basebenza phantsi koxinizelelo olukhulu kuze kufuneke ukuba bathwale ubunzi ma bengqondo bokwazi ukuba basemngciphekweni wokosulelwa yile ntsholongwane.

src_text: ke bagale le bagalegadi ba makgonthe ba phenkgišano ya rena kgahlanong le coronavi rus.
tgt_text: bangamaqhawe namaqhawekazi okwenene wedabi lethu lokulwa intsholongwane icorona .

src_text: re hlompha bagale ba ba maafrika borwa bao ba tlogelago magae a bona, malapa a bona le baratwa ba bona gore ba tle mešomong tšatši ka tšatši ntle le go šitwa ba eya dikliniking, maokelong le mafelong a mangwe a tša maphelo.
tgt_text: siwothulela umnqwazi la makhalipha abemi bomzantsi afrika ashiya amakhaya wabo, iintsapho kunye nabo babathandayo ukuya empangelweni engaphosi nomzuzu yonke imihla kwiikliniki, izibhedlele kunye namanye amaziko ezempilo.

src_text: gona fao ba fana ka tlhokomelo ya bongaka, thekgo ya tša tsamaišo le ditirelo tše dingwe go swana le go hlwekiša le go fepa batho ka dijo.
tgt_text: apho bathi babonelele khona ngenkathalelo yezempilo, inkxaso yobumabhalana nezinye iinkonzo ezifana nokucoca nokulungiselela ukutya.

src_text: ge ba le gare ba phethagatša mešomo ya bona ya bokgoni, le rena bjalo ka setšhaba ke mošomo wa rena go ba šireletša le ba malapa a bona.
tgt_text: njengokuba besenza oko kungumsebenzi wobizo lwabo, nathi sinoxanduva kubo neentsapho zabo.

src_text: maphelo le polokego ya bona a swanetše go tla pele.
tgt_text: impilo yabo nokhuseleko lwabo kufuneka siyixabise kakhulu.

src_text: re a ba hlompha le go ba thekga bjalo ka banna le basadi bao ba laeditšego gore ba itokišeditše go bea maphelo a bona kotsing gore re tle re kgone go phela.
tgt_text: sibanika imbeko siba bekela phezulu njengamadoda nabasetyhini ababonakalise ukuba bazimisele ukubeka ubomi babo emngciphekweni ukuze kuphile thina.

src_text: gore ba kgone go dira mešo mo ya bona ye boimaima ba hloka thekgo le tšhireletšo ya rena ka kabo ya didirišwa tša tšhireletšo ya mmele (dippe).
tgt_text: ukuze bakwazi ukwenza lo msebenzi mkhulu kangaka ufuna amandla badinga inkxaso yethu kwakunye nokhuseleko ngokubonelelwa ngezixhobo zokusebenza ezikhuselekileyo (iippe).

src_text: ka thekgo ya sekhwama sa naga le dineelano tša go tšwa go maafrika borwa a mantši o tee ka o tee, dikgwebong, dithe ong le mebušong ye mengwe, re ile ra kgona go rekela bašomi ba ba bogale dippe.
tgt_text: ngenkxaso yesolidarity fund nezipho ezivela kubantu ngabantu basemzantsi afrika, kumashishini, kwiingxowamali nakoorhulumente bamanye amazwe, sikwazile ukufumanela aba basebenzi bangabona baphambili edabini bakhaliphileyo izixhobo zokusebenza ezikhuselekileyo.

src_text: fao go bilego le tlhaelelo ya dippe, maokelo a rena a hlaganela seemo seo ka ponyo ya leihlo go netefatša gore didirišwa tšeo di ba gona.
tgt_text: apho bekukho khona ukudingeka kweppe izibhedlele zethu zikulungisa ngokukhawuleza oko ukuqinisekisa ukuba zikhona.

src_text: re tseba gore khumanego ya dippe ga se yona tlhotlo e le noši yeo bašomedi ba tša maphelo ba lebaganego le yona.
tgt_text: siyayazi ukuba ukufikelela kwippe asikokuphela komce limngeni abasebenzi bethu benkathalelo yezempilo abajongene nawo.

src_text: go ralala naga ka bophara, dikliniki le maokelo di lebagane le tlhaelelo ya bašomi.
tgt_text: kweli lizwe jikelele iikliniki nezibhedlele zijongene nokudingeka kwabasebenzi.

src_text: bothata bjo bo gare bo a hlaganelwa.
tgt_text: le ngxaki iyalungiswa.

src_text: go thekga mošomo wo bašo medi ba rena bao e lego ba mathomo ba go lwantšha bolwetši bjo ba o phethagatšago nageng ka bophara re romela ditona le batlatšatona seleteng se se nngwe le se se nngwe sa ka mo nageng go utolla ditlhotlo tša fao go ya ka fao batho ba itemogelago tšona dileteng tšeo le go šoma mmogo le makgotlataolo a profense a tša maphelo.
tgt_text: ukuxhasa umsebenzi owenzi wa nga basebenzi bethu abanga bona baphambili edabini kweli lizwe jikelele sithumela abaphathiswa noosekela baphathiswa kwisithili ngasinye kweli lizwe ukuze babe nokuzibonela ngokwabo imicelimngeni ngobunjalo bayo kwezi zithili ukuze base benzisane nabasemagunyeni kwezempilo kula maphondo.

src_text: re swanetše go šoma mmogo go šireletša maphelo a bohle e sego fela a bašomedi ba tša maphelo eupša a bašomedi ka moka.
tgt_text: kufanele sisebenze kunye ukukhusela hayi nje kuphela impilo yabasebenzi abangabona baphambili edabini kodwa bonke nje abasebenzi.

src_text: go šetše go bile le mošomo wa bothakga wo dirilwego ke diyunione go ruta maloko a tšona ka taolo ya go fetelwa ke bolwetši le thibelo gotee le tlhweko.
tgt_text: imibutho yabasebenzi sele yenze umsebenzi omhle wokufundisa amalungu malunga nokulawula nokuthintela usuleleko nococeko.

src_text: tšona diyunione tše di thekga gape mošomo wa kgoro ya mešomo le ya bašomi go swara ditekolo tša mafelo a mešomo go netefatša gore ditshepedišo tša maphelo le tša polokego di a hlongwa go bašomedi bao ba boelago mešomong.
tgt_text: ikwaxhasa nomsebenzi wesebe lezengqesho nezemisebenzi ekwenzeni uhlolo lwasemsebenzini ukuqinisekisa ukuba imimiselo yezempilo nokhuseleko iyalandelwa kubasebenzi ababuyela emsebenzini.

src_text: tše ntši tša diyunion e tša bašomi le tšona di fana ka tshedimošo ya coronavirus go maloko a tšona mola bengmešomo ba le gare ka masolo a temošo.
tgt_text: uninzi lwemibutho yethu yabasebenzi ikwabonelela ngolwazi lwentsholongwane icorona kumalungu wayo kwaye abaqeshi benza amaphulo okuqondisa.

src_text: ye nngwe ya dihlotlo tšeo di hlagetšego naga ya gaborena ke ka fao batho bao go hlatsetšwego gore ba nale coronavirus ba tlontlollwago ka gona.
tgt_text: omnye wemicelimngeni othe wavela kweli lizwe lethu kukubekwa ibala kwabo bantu bathe bafunyaniswa benayo intsholongwane icorona.

src_text: bjalo ka setšhaba, re nale maikarabelo a mohlakanelwa a go fediša go tlontlollwa ga batho bao ba fetetšwego ke coronavirus .
tgt_text: siluluntu, sinoxanduva oludibeneyo lokukuncothula nengcambu ukubeka ibala abantu abosulelwe yintsholongwane icorona .

src_text: go bile le dipego tše hlobaetšago tša ka fao batho ka noši ba hlomarwago go tšwa fao ba tšwago le batho setšhabeng bao ba ipelaetšago kgahlanong le balwetši ba coronavirus ge ba amogelwa maokelong le dikiliniking tša kgauswi le bona.
tgt_text: kubekho iingxelo ezihluphayo zabantu abasikiweyo kuluntu abahlala nalo kunye noluntu oluqhankqalazayo kuba izigulana ezinentsholongwane icorona zilaliswa kwizibhedlele zasekuhlaleni nasezikliniki.

src_text: se se swanetše go fela.
tgt_text: lo nto leyo mayiphele.

src_text: go swana le ka fao re bilego ngatana ye tee go hlohleletša go amogelwa ga batho bao ba nago le hiv le go ema ka lentšu le tee go lwantšha hlaolo ya bona, re swanetše go laetša kwešišo, kgotlelelo, boleta, kwelano le kwelobohloko go bao ba fetetšwego ke baerase ye le ba malapa a bona.
tgt_text: njengoko sasidibene ukukhuthaza ukwamkelwa kwabantu abaphila nentsholongwane kagawulayo (ihiv) saze sema saluqilima ukulwa ukungcungcuthekiswa kwabo, kufuneka sibonakalise ukuqonda, unya mezelwano, inceba, uvelwano nemfesane kwabo bosulelweyo yile ntsholongwane neentsapho zabo.

src_text: gothwe maitshwaro a a go tlontlollwa ga batho a hlohleletšwa ke poifo ya go fetelwa ke bolwetši le go hloka kwešišo.
tgt_text: kuthiwa oku kubekwa kwebala kuqhutywa luloyiko lokosulelwa sesi sifo nokuswela ukuqonda.

src_text: tsela ye kaonekaone ya go fenya poifo ya rena ya tlhago ya bolwetši bjo le ya go fetelwa ke go latela ditshepedišo tša hlweko tšeo di lego gona.
tgt_text: eyona ndlelaingcono yokoyisa uloyiko lokugula olubangelwa lithuku lemvelo nesifo esosulelayo kukuthobela imimiselo yezempilo ekhoyo.

src_text: poifo ya go fetelwa ke bolwetši go hlatsetšwe gore e gona ebile ke ya makgonthe.
tgt_text: uloyiko losuleleko luyavakala kwaye lukhona.

src_text: go le bjalo, re tseba seo re swanetšego go se dira go itšhireletša le go šireletša ba bangwe.
tgt_text: kwangaxesha nye, siyayazi ukuba yinto emasiyenze ukuzikhusela nokukhusela abanye.

src_text: re tseba gore baerasee ye e hlolwa ke eng le gore re ka dira eng go itšhireletša gore re se fetelwe.
tgt_text: siyayazi ukuba ibangelwa yintoni le ntsholongwane nokuthi yintoni esinokuyenza uku zikhusela ukuba singosuleleki.

src_text: re tseba gabotse gore re swanetše go šielana sekgala, go ipeela thoko le batho ba bangwe ge re kopane le bao ba fetetšwego le go ihlagiša maokelong ge re nale dika tša bolwetši bjo.
tgt_text: siyayazi ukuba kufanele sigcine umgama wokuqelelana, ukuzigcina singamakheswa ukuba besidibene nabo bosulelekileyo nokuthi sizise esibhedlele ukuba sineempawu.

src_text: re swanetše go tšwelapele go hlahlwa ke dintlha tša mannete e sego mabarebare.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubeke sikhokelwa yinyaniso hayi amarhe.

src_text: nako yela ya gore mang le mang a bolele gore yena ga a tsebe motho yo a fetetšwego goba a amilwego ke coronavirus e fetile kgale.
tgt_text: ixesha lokuba umntu athi aka zi mntu owosulelweyo okanye ochatshazelweyo yintsholongwane icorona ledlula kudala.

src_text: ka nako ye, go feta mehla yohle, bagwera ba rena, ba malapa, bašomimmogo le baagišane ba hloka kwelobohloko le thekgo ya rena.
tgt_text: ngoku, ngaphezulu kunakuqala, abahlobo bethu, iintsapho, oogxa nabamelwane bethu badinga uvelwano nenkxaso.

src_text: mo matšatšing, dibekeng le dikgwedi tše tlago, re tla fela re ikhwetša re hloka tshepho le go boifa ge re bona palo ya bao ba fetetšwego le bao ba hlokagalago e hlatloga.
tgt_text: kwiintsuku, iiveki nezi nyanga ziphambi kwethu, ngamanye amaxesha siza kuzifumana siphelelwa lithemba kwaye sibe noloyiko xa sibona inani labantu abosulelekayo nababhubhayo liqhubeka ukonyuka.

src_text: go ka direga gore seemo se gakale, eupša re nale bonnete bja gore go tla kaonafala.
tgt_text: kusenokuba izinto zibe mbi ngakumbi, kodwa siqinisekile ukuba ziza kuba ngcono.

src_text: boramahlale ba rena le baeletši ba dingaka ba re boditše gore kelo ya diphetelo e tla hlatloga ge re batamela nhlorwaneng ya rena ya diphetelo.
tgt_text: oosonzululwazi bethu nabacebisi bezonyango basixelele ukuba izinga losule leko liza kunyuka njengoko sifikelela encotsheni yethu.

src_text: eupša nnete ke gore palo ye e tla theogela fase.
tgt_text: kodwa ngokuqinisekileyo liza kuhla.

src_text: re gopola bašomedi ba rena ba tša maphelo bao ba lobilego maphelo a bona ba hlokometše balwetši.
tgt_text: sinika imbeko abasebenzi benkathalelo yezempilo abathe baphulukana nobomi babo benikezela ngenkathalelo kwabagulayo.

src_text: ge re gopola mediro ya bona, a re netefatšeng gore rena le badudi ba gaborena re bolokegile ka go kgatha tema ya rena.
tgt_text: ukubakhumbula, masizigcine sikhuselekile kunye nabanye abemi bakuthi ngokudlala eyethu indima.

src_text: re tla fenya baerase ye le go aga setšhaba ka leswa.
tgt_text: siza kuyoyisa le ntsholongwane size silakhe ngokutsha uluntu lwethu.

src_text: re fetile mehleng ye boima ebile re fentše go yona.
tgt_text: siwabonile amaxesha awayengawonaanzima kodwa soyisa.

src_text: a re tieng maatla le hlohleletšo ge re le gare re šoma mmogo go phološa maphelo.
tgt_text: imbeko ekhethekileyo kubasebenzi bethu benkathalelo yezempilo vukuzenzele unnamed inani lokusweleka okubangelwa yintsho longwane icorona kutsha nje lide ledlula kuphawu lwama2 000. phakathi kwabo bathe baphulukana nobomi babo ngabasebenzi bezempilo, abasebenzi abafezekileyo abebekhathalela abagulayo, kwaye bebeyinkxaso nentuthuzelo kwabo bebesesibhedlele besenziwa amakheswa kwiintsapho zabo.

src_text: molemi wa moswa o amogela thekgo ya covid19 silusapho nyanda molemi yo a sa thomago tša temo wa kua kapa bohlabela ke yo mongwe wa bao ba holegilego go tšwa sekhwameng sa mmušo sa kimollo ya coronavirus.
tgt_text: umlimi osemtsha ufumana inkxaso yecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi osahlumayo wasempuma koloni ngomnye wabantu abaxhamle kwingxowamali karhuluumente yesiqabu kwintsholongwane yecorona .

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka wa mengwaga ye 27 o aga bohwa bja lapa la gabo le lehumo ka go beeletša temong.
tgt_text: unomagcinandile suduka (one minyaka enga ma27) ukhulisa igama nobutyebi bosapho lwakhe ngokutyala imali kwezolimo.

src_text: mong wa kgwebo ya 4 u and 4 me primary cooperative kua motsaneng wa mooiplaas o amogetše thušo go tšwa sekhwameng sa kimollo sa coronavirus (covid19) sa kgoro ya temo, mpshafatšo ya naga le tlhabollo ya dinagamagae ka baka la polasa ya gagwe, ya mae gagwe, diruiwa le merogo.
tgt_text: umnini we4 u and 4 me primary cooperative elalini yasemooiplaas ufumene inkxaso kwingxowamali yesiqabu yentsholongwane yecorona (icovid19) yesebe lezolimo, iinguqu kwezemihlala nophuhliso lwamaphandle ukwenzela ifama yakhe yamaqanda, imfuyo nemifuno.

src_text: kgoro e fane ka dibaotšhara tša go bitša r1.2 bilione go balemi bao ba di hlokago.
tgt_text: isebe linikele ngeevawutsha ezixabisa imali eyibhiliyoni eyi1.2 yeerandi kubalimi abafuna uncedo.

src_text: suduka o bolela gore di baotšhara di tla mo thuša go godiša lehlakore la kgwebo ya gagwe la go tšweletša mae.
tgt_text: usuduka uthi iivawutsha zakhe ziza kumnceda ngokwandisa icala leshishini lakhe lemveliso yamaqanda.

src_text: "ke amogetše dibaotšhara tše tharo tša go bitša r19 000. tšona ke baotšhara ya r12 000 go reka dikgogo tša go bea mae tse 100, baotšhara ya r6 500 ya go reka dijo tša dikgogo le baotšhara ya r500 ya go reka meryana.
tgt_text: "ndifumene iivawutsha ezintathu ezixabisa imali enga ma19 000 eerandi.

src_text: "o thomile polasa ya gagwe ya go tšweletša dikgogo ka go fepa dikgogo tša gae tša lapa la gabo ka dijo tša go di thwathwadiša mae, tšeo di di kgontšhago gore di thwathwatše mae ntle le gore di namelane.
tgt_text: ivawutsha yemali engama12 000 eerandi yokuthenga iinkukhu zamaqa nda ezili100, ivawutsha yama6 500 eerandi yokuthenga ukutya kweenkukhu kunye nevawutsha yama500 eerandi yokuthenga amayeza.

src_text: dikgogo tša gagwe gabjale di tšweletša mae a 50 ka letšatši, gomme yena o wa rekiša beke ka beke.
tgt_text: "uqalise ifama yakhe yemveliso yamaqanda ngokondla iinkukhu zesixhosa zosapho lwakhe ngokutya kokuzenza zibe zinkukhu zamaqanda, nesenza ukuba zikwazi ukuzala amaqanda zingahlangenanga nenkunzi.

src_text: suduka, yo le yena a tsenetšego tša temo ka dipudi tše 73, dinku tše 25 le dikgomo tše 25 o thomile tša temo ka 2015 morago ga go ikhweletša sethifikeithi sa n6 sa taolo ya mmušo go tšwa kholetšeng ya ikhala ya thutatiro le ya tlhahlo.
tgt_text: iinkukhu zakhe ezingama50 ngoku zizala amaqanda angama50 ngosuku, aze awathengise qho ngeveki.

src_text: morago ga go lemoga gore mešomo ga e kaalo, a tšea sephetho sa go tšea polasa yeo ka nako yeo e bego e dirišwa ke lapa la gabo go iphediša a e fetošetša go ba kgwebo ya go dira letseno.
tgt_text: usuduka, ophinda afuye neebhokhwe ezingama73, iigusha ezingama25 neenko mo ezingama25, waqalisa ukufama ngowama2015 emva kokufumana isatifikethi sepublic management kun6 eikhala training and voca tional education and training college.

src_text: suduka ge a bolela o re: "re gotše re dira tša temo, ke moka morago ga go aloga ke tšeere sephetho sa go tsenela temo legatong la go inyakela mošomo."
tgt_text: emva kokufumanisa ukuba amathuba emisebenzi anqongophele, wenza isigqibo sokuthathela kuye umsebenzi wefama yosapho eyayilinyelwa ukuziphilisa ngoko ukuze ayiguqule ibe lishishini elifaka inzuzo.

src_text: se se ile sa hlatsela go ba sephetho sa hlohleletšo, kudu ka ge a godišitše dipudi le dikgomo tša palo ya go bonagala.
tgt_text: usuduka uthi: "sikhule sifama, ngoko ke emva kokuphumelela kwizifundo zam ndenze isigqibo sokufama endaweni yokufuna umsebenzi."

src_text: polasa ya suduka ya di hektara tše tshela ka bogolo e tšweletša mafela, matapola, dierekise le dinawa.
tgt_text: esi sigqibo sizibonakalise njengesenkuthazo, kuba selekhulise iqela leebhokhwe neenkomo.

src_text: mafela a bjalwa dihektareng tše nne, matapola a bjalwa hektareng ye tee mola dierekisi le dinawa di bjalwa mo hektareng ya mafelelo.
tgt_text: ifama yemifuno kasuduka ezihektare ezintandathu ubukhulu ivelisa umbona, iitapile, iierityisi neembotyi.

src_text: suduka o ithutile tše ntši go tšwa go covid19 , kuduku du ka gore thoto ye kaoneka one ke matsogo a gagwe le go šoma ga gagwe ka thata.
tgt_text: umbona ulinywa kwiihektare ezine, iitapile kwihektare enye ukuze iierityisi neembotyi nazo zibe nehektare enye.

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka o fetošeditše polasa ya lapa la gabo ya go iphediša go ba kgwebo ye nnyane.
tgt_text: umlimi osemtsha ufumana inkxaso yecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi osahlumayo wasempuma koloni ngomnye wabantu abaxhamle kwingxowamali karhuluumente yesiqabu kwintsholongwane yecorona .

src_text: afrika borwa e tšea kgato ya go rarolla bothata bja tlhokego ya dithušagohema silusapho nyanda sethušagohema seo se dirilwego ka mo afrika borwa se tla thuša balwetši bao ba nago le dika tša magareng tša covid19 gore ba heme gabonolo.
tgt_text: umzantsi afrika uthatha amanyathelo okulungisa ukudingeka kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa silusapho nyanda isixhobo sokuphefumlisa esenziwe apha ekhaya siza kunceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula umlo wokulwa nesifo sentsholongwane icorona (covid19) emzantsi afrika womelezwe kukuveliswa kwesixhobo sokuphefumlisa sokuqala apha kweli lizweisixhobo sokuphefumlisa soxinzelelo oluluncedo kwimibhobho yomoya oluqhubekayo (icp ap) sinceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula ngokubonelela ngoxinzelelo lomoya onomongomoya okwinqanaba elingephi ukugcina imibhobho yazo yomoya ivulekile.

src_text: ntwa kgahlanong le bolwetši bja coronavirus (covid19) ka afrika borwa e matlafaditšwe ke sethušagohema sa mathomo seo se dirilwego ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: esi sixhobo sokuphefumlisa sayilwa libhunga lophandonzulu kwezobunzululwazi nezoshishino (icsir) ngentsebenziswano neqela labehlulelani balapha ekhaya kwaye siza kufezekiswa kweli lizwe jikelele kwizigulane ezibonakalisa iingxaki zokuphefumla kwizigaba zokuqala zosuleleko lwecovid19.

src_text: sethušagohema sa continuous positive airway pressure (cpap) se thuša balwetši bao ba nago le dika tša magareng tša covid19 gore ba kgone go hema gabonolo ka go ba fa moya wa oksetšene gore o dire gore meelamoya ya bona e dule e bulegile.
tgt_text: "umoya umntu awuphefumlayo ngokwesiqhelo unomongomoya ohlanganisiweyo oziipesenti ezingama23.

src_text: sethušagohema se hlamilwe ke ba council for scientific and industrial research (csir) ka tšhomišano le e tšwelapele letlakaleng la 2o boloke afrika borwammogo re ka fenya coronaviruso bolokeg batšeakarolo ba se bakae ba mo gae, gomme e tla abelwa balwetši go phatlalala le naga bao ba nago le mathata a go hema mo legatong la mathomo la phetelo ya covid19.
tgt_text: umatshini wecp ap ungampompa umthamo ophezulu womongomoya, ukuncedisa umntu ukuba aphefumle.

src_text: "moya woo motho ao hemago o na le dipersente tše 23 tša oksetšene.
tgt_text: icp ap impompa umongomoya ohlanganisiweyo ngokuqhubekayo.

src_text: sethušagohema sa cpap se kgona go pompa oksetšene e ntšhi, gomme ya thuša motho go hema.
tgt_text: ungawandisa okanye uwunciphise umthamo womongomoya umntu awuphefumlela ngaphakathi," utsho umlawuli wesigqeba wecsir future production: manufacturing umartin sanne.

src_text: cpap e pompa oksetšene e sa emiše.
tgt_text: izigulane ezisebenzisa isixhobo sokuphefumlisa zinxulumanyiswa ngokuthi zinxityiswe isigqubuthelobuso.

src_text: o ka oketša goba wa fokotša bontšhi bja oksetšene yeo motho a e hemago," gwa realo molaodiphethiši wa csir future production: manufacturing, elego martin sanne.
tgt_text: umongomoya utsalwa kwitanki yegesi yomongomoya uze udityaniswe nomoya wendalo kwisixhobo sokuphefumlisa, ukusuka kulo ndawo ukuya kugqithiselwa kwisigqubuthelobuso uze uphefumlelwe ngaphakathi sisigulane.

src_text: balwetši bao ba šomišago sethušagohema ba se lokelwa maskeng woo ba tla bego ba o apere oksetšene e gogwa go tšwa tankeng ya kgase gomme ya hlakantšhwa le moya wa tlhago ka gare ga sethušagohema, gomme go tloga moo o romelwa maskeng gomme wa hemelwa ka gare ke molwetši.
tgt_text: usanne uthi ukongeza ekumpontshweni komoya womongomoya, icp ap ikwanceda izigulane ukuba zikwazi ukuphefumlela ngaphandle.

src_text: sanne o bolela gore godimo ga go pompa moya wa go ba le oksetšene, cpap e thuša gape balwetši gore ba hemele ka ntle.
tgt_text: isixhobo sec pa p singasetyenziswa kwiimeko ezinobuchwepheshe obuxhome kakhulu bezonyango nakwiimeko zethutyana, ezifana nezibhedlele zethutyana nakumaziko okuvalela bucala.

src_text: sedirišwa sa cpap se ka šomišwa mafelong a tša maphelo a theknolotši ya godimo gape le ka mafelong a nakwana a bjalo ka maokelo a nakwana le mafelo a boipeelothoko.
tgt_text: usanne uthi icsir kufanele ibe ivelise izixhobo zokuphefumlisa ezingama10 000 ekupheleni kweyethupha.

src_text: sanne a re csir e tla be e kgonne go dira dithušagohema tše 10 000 ge kgwedi ya phato e fihla mafelelong.
tgt_text: ngokusebenzisana nabakwasiemens, abakwasimera, abakwaakacia, abakwagabler, umoya kunye neyunivesithi yasekapa (iuct), icsir ivelise icp ap ngokwemigangatho yombutho wezempilo wehlabathi (iwho).

src_text: ka tšhomišano le siemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya le yunibesithi ya cape town, csir e tšweleditše cpap go ya le ka melawana ya mokgatlo wa lefase wa tša maphelo.
tgt_text: iqela lokuqala lezi zixhobo zokuphefumlisa liza kunikezelwa kwizibhedlele zikarhulumente eziphantsi koxinzelelo ngenxa yokungabikho kwezixhobo zokuqubisana necovid19.

src_text: dithušagohema tša mathomo di tla fiwa maokelo a mmušo ao a lego bothateng bja tlhokego ya didirišwa tša go lwantšhana le covid19.
tgt_text: icsir iqalise ukusebenza ngecp ap emva kokuba ihlabathi liqalise ukufumana ukudingeka okukhulu kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa.

src_text: csir e thomile go šomana le cpap morago ga gore lefase le itemogele tlhokego ye kgolo ya dithušagohema.
tgt_text: "malunga nenyanga yokwindla nekatshazimpuzi, kwasuka ngesiquphe kwakho ukungabikho ngokwaneleyo kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa kubaboneleli bethu bezizwengezizwe.

src_text: "dikgweding tša hlakola le moranang go bile le tlhokego ya dithušagohema go tšwa go baabi ba tšona ba boditšhabatšhaba.
tgt_text: apho zazifumaneka khona, zazibiza kakhulu, ngoko ke urhulumente wakhupha isinikimaxabiso sokuveliswa kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa," utsho usanne.

src_text: moo di bego di hwetšagala gona di be di bitša kudu, gomme ke moo mmušo o ntšhitšego thentara ya go dira dithušagohema," gwa realo sanne.
tgt_text: isinikimaxabiso ibiyinxalenye yeprojekthi yesizwe karhulumente yezixhobo zokuphefumlisa ngaphakathi kwesebe lezorhwebo, ushishino nokhuphiswano.

src_text: thentara yeo e be e le karolo ya protšeke ya bosetšhaba ya dithušagohema ya ka lefapheng la tša kgwebo, intaseteri le phadišano.
tgt_text: icsir ikwasebenza nangesixhobo sokuphefumlisa soxinzelelo oluluncedo kwimibhobho yomoya omanqanabamabini (ibilevel positive airway pressure) onjongo zawo zikukunceda izigulane ezineempawu ezibukhali kakhulu zecovid19.

src_text: csir e gare e šoma gape ka sethušagohema sa bilevel positive airway pressure seo nepo ya sona elego go thuša balwetši bao ba nago le dika tše šoro tša covid19sethušagohema seo se tla thuša ka go hemela ka gare le ka ntle, e ka ba ka mokgwa wa go gatelela moya goba ka go lekola kabo ya oksetšene yeo molwetši a e hlokago, gape le go beakanya kgatelelo ya moya go ya le ka moo e hlokegago.
tgt_text: umzantsi afrika uthatha amanyathelo okulungisa ukudingeka kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa silusapho nyanda isixhobo sokuphefumlisa esenziwe apha ekhaya siza kunceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula umlo wokulwa nesifo sentsholongwane icorona (covid19) emzantsi afrika womelezwe kukuveliswa kwesixhobo sokuphefumlisa sokuqala apha kweli lizweisixhobo sokuphefumlisa soxinzelelo oluluncedo kwimibhobho yomoya oluqhubekayo (icp ap) sinceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula ngokubonelela ngoxinzelelo lomoya onomongomoya okwinqanaba elingephi ukugcina imibhobho yazo yomoya ivulekile.

src_text: thuša go emiša go phatlalala ga covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed setšhaba sa gaborena se lebagane le bothata bjo bogolo historing ya temokrasi ya rena.
tgt_text: nceda unqande ukunwenwa kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed isizwe sakuthi sijamelene neyona ntlekele inzima kakhulu kwimbali yedemokhrasi yethu.

src_text: mo matšatšing a go feta a 120, re atlegile go diteleng go phatlalala ga baerase yeo e hlolago masetlapelo lefaseng ka bophara.
tgt_text: iintsuku ezingaphezulu kwezi120, siphumelele ekulibaziseni ukunwenwa kwale ntsholongwane izisa intshabalalo kwihlabathi jikelele.

src_text: efela gabjale go keka ga diphetetšo, fao re kilego ra eletšwa ke ditsebi tša bongaka gore go tlo ba gona, go fihlile.
tgt_text: kodwa ngoku, ukunyuka ngamandla kosuleleko esasicetyiswe ngako zingcali zethu zezonyango ukuba kuseza kuza, sekufikile.

src_text: palo ya go feta kotara ya milione ya maafrika borwa e fetetšwe ke coronavirus, gomme ebile re a tseba gore diphetetšo tše dintšhi di iphihlile.
tgt_text: bangaphezulu kwekota yesigidi abantu basemzantsi afrika abosulelwe yintsholongwane icorona, kwaye siyayazi ukuba luseluninzi olunye usuleleko olungabonwanga.

src_text: gabjale go netefatšwa diphetetšo tše diswa tša go feta 12 000 tšatši le lengwe le le lengwe.
tgt_text: ngoku sibhalisa ngaphezulu kwama12, 000 ezehlo zosuleleko ezintsha yonke imihla.

src_text: esale go tloga mola bolwetši bjo bo phulegago ka kgwedi ya hlakola, go hlokofetše batho ba 4 079 ba bolawa ke covid19.
tgt_text: ukususela ukuqalisa kokuqhambuka kwayo kwinyanga yokwindla, ngabantu abangama4,079 ubuncinane abathe basweleka ngenxa yecovid19.

src_text: bjalo ka maphoto a magolo a go tonya ao a budulelago ka nageng ya rena go tšwa ka lewatleng la south atlantic mo nakong ye ya ngwaga, go na le dikarolo di se kae tša ka mo nageng tšeo di ka se fihlelelwego ke coronavirus.
tgt_text: njengale ngqele iqhaqhazelisa amazinyo indlongozela ukungena kwilizwe lethu ivela kwiatlantic esemazantsi ngeli xesha lonyaka, imbalwa imimandla yeli lizwe eya kusinda kule ntsholongwane icorona.

src_text: coronaviruse kotsi le go ba šoro kudu go feta efe goba efe yeo e kilego ya ba gona.
tgt_text: uhlaselo lwentsholongwane icorona lukude le ngobukhali kwaye lutshabalalisa ngaphezulu kwalo naluphi na utshabalalo esakhe salwazi ngaphambili.

src_text: e tloga e tlaralatša mošomo wa didirišwa tša rena le maikemišetšo ka go fetišiša.
tgt_text: lutweza imithombo yethu kunye nokuthatha kwethu izigqibo kude kufikelele ekupheleni.

src_text: go keka ga diphetetšo, elego seo se akantšwego ke ditsebi le boramahlale ba borena kgweding tše tharo tšeo di fetilego, go fihlile.
tgt_text: ukunyuka ngamandla kosuleleko ebeluthelekelelwe kwangaphambili zingcali noosonzululwazi bethu kwezi nyanga zi3 zidlulileyo, kude kwafika ke ngoku.

src_text: go thomile ka kapa bodikela gomme gabjale go tsene ka kapa bohlabela le ka gauteng.
tgt_text: kuqale entshona koloni kwaye ngoku kuyaqhubeka empuma koloni nasegauteng.

src_text: le ge go le bjalo, ge diphetetšo di golela godimo ka lebelo, go bohlokwa go lemoga gore palo ya mahu ya dipersente tše 1.5 ke ye nngwe ya dipalo tša fasefase lefaseng ge e bapetšwa le ya lefase ya dipersente tše 4.4. go ba fasefase ga palo ya mahu ka nageng ya gaborena go hlotšwe ke maitemogelo le boikgafo bja bašomedi ba tša maphelo gape le magato a tšhoganetšo ao re a tšeerego go hlabolla mokgwa wa tša maphelo.
tgt_text: kanti, nangona usuleleko lukhula ngokucacileyo, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuba izinga lethu lokusweleka leepesenti e1.5 liphakathi kwawona mazinga aphantsi ehlabathini.

src_text: le ge bontšhi bja batho ba gaborena ba tšeere magato a go thibela phatlalalo ya baerase, go na le bao ba sego ba dira bjalo.
tgt_text: oku kuthelekiswa nomyinge wezinga lezehlo zokusweleka ehlabathini jikelele elikwiipesenti ezi4.4.

src_text: go na le ba bangwe bao ba hlokomologago melawana yeo e fetišitšwego ya go lwantšhana le bolwetši bjo.
tgt_text: sifanele ukubulela amava nokuzinikela kwamagcisa wethu wezonyango namanyathelo angxamisekileyo esiwathathileyo ukwakha amandla enkqubo yethu yezempilo ngala manani asezantsi okusweleka kwilizwe lethu.

src_text: mo kgabagareng ya leuba le, go tsena ka gare ga thekisi o se wa apara maske, go kopana le bagwera, go ya meletlong goba gona go etela meloko, go ka phatlalatša baerase gabonolo gomme gwa ba le go lobja ga maphelo.
tgt_text: nangona uninzi lwabantu bakuthi bewathathile amanyathelo okuthintela ukunwenwa kwale ntsholongwane, bakhona abanye abangayenzanga loo nto.

src_text: bjo e ka no ba e le bolwetši bjoo bo hlolwago ke baerase, efela bo phatlalatšwa ke mekgwa le maitshwaro a batho.
tgt_text: bakhona abanye apha phakathi kwethu abangayihoyiyo imimiselo ephunyezelwe ukulwa esi sifo.

src_text: ka maitshwaro a rena – re le batho, malapa le ditšhaba – re ka kgona ebile re swanetše re fetole mokgwaphatlalalo wa leuba le ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: ebunzulwini bonje yena ubhubhane, ukukhwela iteksi ungasinxibanga isigqubuthelobuso, iindibano zabahlobo, ukuya kwiziyunguma okanye ukutyelela usapho, nako ngokulula kunokubangela ukusasazeka kwentsholongwane kunye nokuphulukana nobomi.

src_text: re swanetše re apare maske wa lešela woo o khupetšago nko le molomo nako ye nngwe le ye nngwe ge re e tšwa ka gae.
tgt_text: esi ingasisifo esibangelwe yile ntsholongwane, kodwa sisasazwa yindlela abantu abaziphethe ngayo nendlela yokuziphatha.

src_text: re swanetše re tšwele pele go hlapa diatla ka meetse le sesepe goba sebolayaditwatši ka mehla.
tgt_text: ngenxa yamanyathelo wethu – njengomntu ngamnye, njengeentsapho, njengoluntu – sinakho kwaye kufuneka simtshintshile lo bhubhane kwilizwe lethu.

src_text: re swanetše re tšwele pele go hlwekiša le go bolaya ditwatši mabatong ka moka a mafelo a bohle.
tgt_text: kufanele sinxibe isigqubuthelobuso esenziwe ngelaphu esigquma iimpumlo nomlomo ngalo lonke ixesha siphuma ekhaya.

src_text: sa bohlokwa le go feta ke gore re swanetše re bule sekgoba sa dimitara tše pedi gare ga rena le batho ba bangwe.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubeke sihlamba izandla zethu rhoqo ngesepha namanzi okanye ngesibulalizintsholongwane.

src_text: gabjale go na le bohlatse bjoo bo tšwelelago bja gore baerase ye e ka kgona le go fofa moyeng mo mafelong ao a tletšego batho ba bantšhi, ao a tswalegilego goba ao ka go ona moya o sa sepelego botse.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubeke nokucoca size sifake nesibulalizintsholongwane kuyo yonke imiphezulu/imiphandle kuzo zonke iindawo zikawonkewonke.

src_text: ka lona lebaka le, re swanetše re hlabolle mafelo a setšhaba ao a tswalegilego ka pelapela, elego fao kotsi ya go fetelwa e lego godimo kudu.
tgt_text: okona kubaluleke nangakumbi, kufuneka sigcine umgama wokuqelelana okhuselekileyo – ozimitha ezi2 ubuncinane – ukusuka kwabanye abantu.

src_text: sephetho sa rena sa go tla ka kiletšo ya mosepelo ya bosetšhaba se thibetše phatlalalo ya diphetetšo mathomong ge ditirelo tša maphelo di be di se tša itokiša, elego seo se ka bego se hlotše tobo ye kgolo ya maphelo.
tgt_text: ngoku kukho ubungqina obuvelayo bokuba le ntsholongwane isenokuhamba njengamasuntswana amancinci emoyeni kwiindawo ezinabantu abaninzi, ezivaliweyo okanye ezingangeni kakuhle umoya.

src_text: ka nako yeo re bilego le yona, re tšeere magato a bohlokwa go matlafatša mekgwa ya go ikarabela ya tša maphelo.
tgt_text: ngenxa yeso sizathu kufuneka ngoko nangoko siphucule imo yangaphakathi kwiindawo zikawonkewonke apho umngcipheko wobungozi bosuleleko umkhulu kakhulu khona.

src_text: re šetše re dirile diteko tša coronavirus tša go feta dimilione tše pedi, gomme bašomedi ba tša maphelo ba šetše ba dirile diponego tša go feta dimilione tše 20. re dirile gore go be le mepete e 28 000 ya balwetši ba covid19 ka maokelong, gomme ebile re agile maokelo a nakwana go kgabaganya naga.
tgt_text: isigqibo sethu sokubhengeza ukuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile kwizwelonke sathintela ukunyuka ngamandla kosuleleko ngobuninzi ngexesha apho iinkonzo zethu zezempilo zazingekasilungeli esi simo, nento eyayinokukhokelela kweyona lahleko inkulu yokuphulukana nobomi.

src_text: gabjale re na le mepete e 37 000 ya boipeelothoko mafelong a poraebete le a setšhaba go kgabaganya naga, gomme a itokišeditše go amogela bao ba sa kgonego go ipeela thoko ka magae.
tgt_text: kwixesha ebesinalo, sithathe amanyathelo abalulekileyo okomeleza indlela yethu yezempilo yokusabela.

src_text: re rekile le go aba dimilione tša didirišwa tša go itšhireletša maokelong, dikliniking le dikolong go kgabaganya naga, e lego tša go šireletša bašomedi bao ba šomago ka batho ba bantšhi.
tgt_text: senze uvavanyo lwentsholongwane icorona olungaphezulu kwezigidi ezimbini kanti ke oonompilo benze uhlolo olungaphezulu kwezigidi ezingama20.

src_text: re thwetše ebile re sa thwala baoki, dingaka le bašomedi ba tša tšhoganetšo ba tlaleletšo.
tgt_text: sineebhedi ezingama28,000 esibhedlele ezilungele ukusetyenziswa zizigulane zecovid19 saze sakha izibhedlele zethutyana ezisebenzayo kwizwelonke.

src_text: re tšwela pele go ba le tšwelopele mo maitekelong a rena a go lwantšha covid19, efela tlhotlo ye kgolo e sa etla.
tgt_text: ngoku sineebhedi zokuvaleleka bucala ezingama37,000 kumaziko abucala namaziko karhulumente kwiizwelonke, ezilungele ukwenza amakheswa abo bangakwaziyo ukwenza njalo emakhayeni wabo.

src_text: re šoma go kgabaganya diprofense go oketša palo ya mepete ya ka diwateng le ka tlhokomelong yeo e tseneletšego re direla balwetši ba covid19.
tgt_text: sithenge saza sathumela izigidi zezixhobo zokuzikhusela emsebenzini kwizibhedlele, kwiiklinikhi kunye nasezikolweni kwizwelonke ukukhusela abasebenzi bethu abangabona baphambili edabini.

src_text: sekgoba se a bulwa ka maokelong a mmalwa ka go se amogele balwetši bao ba sa hlokego thušo ya tšhoganetšo.
tgt_text: siye saqasha kwaye siyaqhubeka nokufuna abongikazi, oogqirha nabasebenzi bakaxakeka bezempilo abongezelelweyo.

src_text: go fetolwa gape le mafelo a mangwe ka maokelong go ba diwate tša tlaleletšo, gape le go agwa goba go oketšwa ga maokelo a nakwana.
tgt_text: siyaqhubeka nokwenza inkqubela kumalinge wethu okuqubisana necovid19, kodwa owona mcelimngeni mkhulu usengaphambili.

src_text: re šoma go oketša kabo ya oksetšene, dithušagohema le didirišwa tše dingwe bakeng sa bao ba tlo hlokago tlhokomelo yeo e tseneletšego, go balwa le kabo ya oksetšene bakeng sa mabaka a mangwe.
tgt_text: kuwo onke amaphondo, sime ngomumo ukwandisa ngakumbi inani leewadi zesiqhelo ezibhedlele kunye neebhedi zabagula kakhulu zezigulane zecovid19.

src_text: re diriša ditheknolotši tša titšithale go matlafatša taetšo, go nyakana gape le go beela thoko balwetši, le go thekga bao diteko tša bona di laetšago ba fetetšwe.
tgt_text: umthamo weewadi zesiqhelo ezibhedlele uphunguliwe kwizibhedlele ezininzi ngokuthi kulityaziswe kwabo badinga inkathalelo engangxamisekanga, ukuguqulwa kweendawo ezithile zesibhedlele ukuba zibe ngamacandelo ongezelelweyo wabagulayo nokwakhiwa okanye ukwandiswa kwezibhedlele zethutyana.

src_text: bjale ka ge re lebile sehloeng sa diphetetšo, re hloka go ba le tlhokomelo ye kgolo le go thatafatša magato ao a latelwago gabjale go fokotša lebelo la diphetetšo.
tgt_text: sisebenzela ukwandisa ubonelelo lomongomoya, izixhobo zokuphefumlisa kunye nezinye izixhobo zabo badinga inkathalelo yabagula kakhulu, kuquka nokutshintsha ubonelelo lomongomoya ebelusetyenziselwa ezinye iinjongo.

src_text: melawana ya mabapi le go apara dimaske e tla thatafatšwa.
tgt_text: sifaka ubuchwepheshe bedijithali ukuqinisa indlela ekubonwa ngayo, ukulanda umkhondo nokwenziwa amakhweswa kwabo bebedibene nomntu osulelekileyo, kunye nokubonelela ngenkxaso kwabo uvavanyo lubafumanise bosulelekile.

src_text: bengmešomo, bengmabenkele le balaodi, baotledi ba dinamelwa tša bohle, gape le balaodi le beng ba meago efe goba efe ya setšhaba, gabjale ba tlamegile semolao go netefatša gore yo mongwe le yo mongwe yoo a tsenago ka moagong goba ka senamelweng sa bona o swanetše go ba a apere maske.
tgt_text: njengokuba sisondela kwinkcochoyi yosuleleko, sidinga ukulumka ngakumbi size siqinise la manyathelo sele ekho ukuthomalalisa izinga lokusasazeka.

src_text: dithekisi tšeo di tšeago maeto a kgauswi di a dumelelwa go rwala go fihlela dipersenteng tše lekgolo, mola tša maeto a matelele di se tša dumelelwa go feta dipersente tše masomešupa, gomme gona fao go latelwe melawana e meswa ya mabapi le dimaske, go bolaya ditwatši ka dinamelweng gape le go bula mafasetere.
tgt_text: imigaqo engokunxitywa kwezigqubuthelobuso iza kuqiniswa.

src_text: gabjale go na le bohlatse bjoo bo tletšego bja gore thekišo ya dinotagi e hlotše kgatelelo ye kgolo go maokelo, go akaretšwa le ka diyuniting tša maemo a tšhoganetšo le tša tlhokomelo yabao ba bakwago le badimo ka baka la dikotsi tša difatanaga, dikgaruru le mathata a go sepelelana le tšona.
tgt_text: abaqashi, abanini zivenkile kunye nabalawuli, abaqhubi bezithuthi zikawonkewonke, kunye nabalawuli kunye nabanini baso nasiphi na isakhiwo sikawonkewonke bayanyanzelwa ngumthetho ukuba baqinisekise nabani na ongena kwizakhiwo zabo okanye izithuthi kufuneka esinxibile isigqubuthelobuso.

src_text: ka fao, re tšeere sephetho sa gore, go re re kgone go lota sekgoba seo se šetšego se le gona ka maokelong, gona thekišo, kabo le phatlalatšo ya dinotagi e tla fegwa go tloga gonabjalebjale.
tgt_text: iiteksi ezihamba imigama emifutshane ngoku ziza kuvunyelwa ukuba ziwandise umthamo wazo wokukhwelisa i100 leepesenti, ngelixa ezihamba imigama emide zingavumelekanga ukuba ziwandise umthamo wama70 eepesenti, phantsi komqathango wokulandelwa kwemimiselo yokuthomalalisa umngcipheko omalunga nokunxitywa kwezigqubuthelobuso, ukucocwa kwezithuthi ngesibulalizintsholongwane kunye nokuvulwa kweefestile.

src_text: bjalo ka legato la tlaleletšo la go fokotša tlalelo ya maokelo, ga go na motho yoo a swanetšego go ba ka ntle mebileng go tloga ka iri ya senyane bošego go fihla ka iri ya bone ka masa.
tgt_text: ngoku kukho ubungqina obucacileyo bokuba ukuqaliswa kokuthengiswa kotywala kukhokelele ekubekweni kwezibhedlele zethu phantsi koxinzelelo olumandla, kuquka namacandelo abonzakeleyo kunye namacandelo abagula kakhulu (iicu), ngenxa yeengozi zeemoto, ubundlobongela kunye nokwenzakala okunxulumene nabo.

src_text: re tšea magato a re tseba gabotse gore ga a amogelege ebile a bea mapheko maphelong a batho, efela a swanetše gore a tšewe gore re kgone go feta sehloa sa bolwetši.
tgt_text: ngoko ke sithathe isigqibo sokuba khona ukuze sikwazi ukugcina umthamo wezibhedlele uphantsi, ukuthengiswa, ukusasazwa kunye nokuhanjiswa kotywala kuza kurhoxiswa ngoko nangoko.

src_text: ga go na ka mokgwa woo re ka efogago lephoto la coronavirus, efela re ka kgona go fokotša tshenyo yeo le ka e hlolago maphelong a rena.
tgt_text: njengenyathelo elongezelelweyo lokunciphisa uxinzelelo ezibhedlele, kuza kumiselwa ixesha lokuvaleleka ngendlu phakathi kwentsimbi ye9 ngokuhlwa nentsimbi yesi4 ekuseni.

src_text: bjalo ka setšhaba, re a thekgana, re thekga le bao ba lwalago ebile re hlohleletša kamogelo ya batho bao ba phelago ka baerase ye.
tgt_text: siwathatha la manyathelo sikuqonda kakuhle ukuba abeka ubomi babantu phantsi kwezithintelo ezingamkelekiyo.

src_text: gabjale, le go feta peleng, re rwele maikarabelo a bao re phelago le bona.
tgt_text: noxa kunjalo, ayafuneka, ayimfuneko ukusinceda siphumele kweli xesha le nkcochoyi yesi sifo.

src_text: re tla le fediša lephoto le.
tgt_text: ayikho indlela esinokuthi siluphephe olu qhwithelo lwentsholongwane icorona.

src_text: re tla bušetša naga ya gaborena maemong a mabotse a maphelo, gomme ebile re tla ba le tšwelopele.
tgt_text: kodwa singawuthothisa umonakalo le ntsholongwane enokuwenza kubomi bethu.

src_text: re tla fenya.
tgt_text: nceda unqande ukunwenwa kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed isizwe sakuthi sijamelene neyona ntlekele inzima kakhulu kwimbali yedemokhrasi yethu.

src_text: go keteka basadi ka go ba go keteka basadi ka go ba akaretša ekonomingakaretša ekonoming vukuzenzele unnamed ka phato afrika borwa e keteka kgwedi ya basadi.
tgt_text: ukubhiyozela abantu basetyhini ukubhiyozela abantu basetyhini ngokubabandakanya kuqoqoshongokubabandakanya kuqoqosho vukuzenzele unnamed ngenyanga yethupha umzantsi afrika ubhiyozela inyanga yabantu basetyhini.

src_text: tiragalo ye e dira matswalo a letšatši ka 1956 ge basadi ba 20 000 ba matšhetša union buildings – basadi ba bantši ba go bolela malema a go fapana, go tšwa mafelong a go fapana gomme ba mehlobo ka moka.
tgt_text: eli thuba liphawula isikhumbuzo samhla abasetyhini abangama20 000 ngowe1956 bathi benza umngcelele woqhankqalazo ukuya kwizakhiwo zomdibaniso – inyambalala yamakhosikazi athetha iilwimi ngeelwimi, ephuma kwiinkalo nakwiintlanga zonke.

src_text: ba be ba kopane ka senyakwa sa bona sa go fediša melao ya dipasa le tokelo ya bona ya go phela ka tokologo.
tgt_text: emanyene kwisinyanzeliso sawo sokupheliswa kwemithetho emibi yamapasi kunye nelungelo lawo lokuhlala enkululekweni.

src_text: maemo le kemo ya basadi ka afrika borwa lehono a fapana kudu le ao bommago rena le bokoko a rena ba bego ba phela ka fase ga wona ka 1956. re tšwa kgole gore re be le afrika borwa ya go hloka semorafe, ya go hloka kgethologanyo ya bong, ya go huma gape yeo e lokologilego.
tgt_text: isimo nendawo abantu basetyhini ababekwa kuyo emzantsi afrika namhlanje yohluke kakhulu kunaleyo oomama noomakhulu bethu babejongene nayo ngowe1956.

src_text: go bile le tšwelopele kudu mo go kaonafatšeng maphelo a basadi ba afrika borwa go ekonomi, lekala la dipolotiki le go bophelo bja setšhaba.
tgt_text: sihambe indlela ende ekuphumezeni umzantsi afrika ongenacalucalulo ngokobuhlanga, ngokwesini, olawulwa ngokwentando yesininzi, ohlumayo nokhululekileyo.

src_text: go le bjalo, re a tseba gore re sa ya kgole.
tgt_text: kubekho inkqubela yokwenene ekuphuculeni ubomi babantu basetyhini basemzantsi afrika kwezoqoqosho, kwizinga lezepolitiki nakubomi bukawonkewonke.

src_text: basadi ba sa lebane le kgethollo, tlhorišo le dikgaruru, gomme ba sa phela ka bohloki.
tgt_text: kwangaxesha nye, siyaqonda ukuba isende indlela ekusafanele siyihambile.

src_text: ge e le gore ka nnete re nyaka go diragatša tshepišo ya molaotheo wa rena re swanetše go lwantšha dikgato tse di dirago gore basadi ba se be le letseno le tšhelete moo go dirago gore ba ikhwetše ba kgotleletše go hlorišwa le go bethwa.
tgt_text: abantu basetyhini basajongene nokucalulwa, impathombi nobundlobongela, kwaye basajongene nobunzima obukhulu bendlala.

src_text: re tsenetše lesolo la go ribolla leswika leo le re amantšhago le maitapišo a lefase a go fihlelela tekatekano ya bong ka 2030. tekatekano ya meloko ke agenda ya tlhohleletšo le phetogo go fediša kgethollo le dikgaruru kgahlanong le basadi le bana le go kgatha tema ka go lekana bophelong bja dipolotiki, leago le ekonomi.
tgt_text: ukuba ngaba sizimisele ekuphumezeni isithembiso somgaqosiseko, kufanele siloyisile uqoqosho nokukhetheka kwezezimali okwenza ukuba abantu basetyhini babe zizisulu zokuphathwa kakubi nobundlo bongela ngakumbi.

src_text: bjalo ka karolo ya lesolo le, re kopantše ‘ditirišano tša twantšho’ tše pedi, yenngwe ke ya toka le ditokelo tša ekonomi ge ye nngwe e le ya kgahlanong le dikgaruru tše di ekadilego ka bong.
tgt_text: sizibandakanye nephulo eliqalayo ukubakho elisiqhagamshelanisa namalinge ehlabathi jikelele okuphumeza umakulingwane ngowesini ngowama2030.

src_text: bobedi ditabakgolo tše di bohlokwa go agenda ya rena ya bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: umakulingwane kwisizukuluwana yiajenda yebhongo neyenguqu yokuphelisa ucalucalulo nobundlobongela obugxile kwabasetyhini nokuthatha kwabo inxaxheba ngokulinganayo kubomi bezepolitiki, ezentlalo nobezoqoqosho.

src_text: dikgwedi tše 11 go tloga mola leano la twantšho la go arabela la tšhoganetšo go lwantšha dikgaruru tšeo di ikadilego ka bong le dipolao tša basadi (gbvf) ke banna le phethagatšwago go bonagetše tšwelopele go godiša thekgo le tlhokomelo ya bao ba phologilego, gomme go na le tšwelopele go kaonafatšeng molao go ba fa tšhireletšo ye kgolo.
tgt_text: njengenxalenye yeli phulo, sizibandakanye ‘neendibanisela zokusebenza’ ezimbini, enye yeyobulungisa kwezoqoqosho namalungelo kunye nenye yokulwa ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini.

src_text: mo kgweding ya phato, re thoma ka phethagatšo ya leano la peakanyo la bosetšhaba go lwantšha gbvf ke banna.
tgt_text: yomibini le mixholo ibaluleke kakhulu kuqobo lweajenda yethu yesizwe.

src_text: ntlha ya bohlokwa ya leano le ke go kgonthiša gore basadi ba bantši ba fiwa kudu menyetla mo ditšheleteng.
tgt_text: sele izinyanga ezilishumi elinanye ukususela kwafezekiswa isicwangciso sokusebenza ukusabela kwimeko kaxakeka sokulwa ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini nokubulawa kwabasetyhini ngamadoda senze inkqubela ekunabiseni inkxaso nenkathalelo kwabasindileyo, kwaye inkqubela iyenzeka kuhlaziyo lwezomthetho ukubanika ukhuseleko olukhulu.

src_text: se ke ka gore go se lekalekane ga ekonomi le go se lekalekane ga leago go a sepelelana.
tgt_text: ngenyanga yethupha, siyaqala ukufezekisa isicwangciso sobuchule sesizwe ukulwa ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini nokubulawa kwabasetyhini ngamadoda.

src_text: maemo a basadi ka afrika borwa a ba dira gore ba be kotsing ya go hlorišwa.
tgt_text: umba ongundoqo wesi sicwangciso usekuqinisekiseni ngokubandakanyeka kakhulu kwabantu basetyhini kwezezimali.

src_text: re swanetše go oketša thekgo ya basadi go ba kgontšha gore ba itirele tšhelete ya bona.
tgt_text: oku kungenxa yokuba ukungalingani kwezoqoqosho nokungalingani kwezentlalo kuyathungelana.

src_text: re dirile maikgafo a mmalwa ka fase ga tekatekano ya moloko yeo e tla tšweletšago dipoelo ka leano la peakanyo ya bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: isimo sezoqoqosho sabantu basetyhini emzantsi afrika sibenza babe zizisulu zokuphathwa kakubi ngakumbi.

src_text: sa mathomo, re ya go tsentšha basadi mererong ya ekonomi ka go ba abela dithendara.
tgt_text: ngoko ke kufuneka siyinyusile inkxaso yabasetyhini ukubenza bakwazi ukuzimela ngokwezezimali.

src_text: re beile selebanywa sa go kgonthiša gore bonnyane dithoto le ditirelo tša go lekana 40% tšeo di rekilwego ke makala a setšhaba di tšwe dikgwebong tša basadi.
tgt_text: senze iqela lezibophelelo phantsi kukamakulingwane kwisizukuluwana oko kuza kuqala ukucaca kwisicwangciso sobuchule sesizwe.

src_text: sa bobedi, re ya go oketša thekgo go dismme tša basadi le go basadi bao ba nago le dikgwebo tša mo mebileng goba bao ba sa šomego.
tgt_text: okokuqala, siza kuqhuba ukubandakanyeka kwabantu basetyhini kuqoqosho ngenkqubo yentengo karhulumente.

src_text: se se tla akaretša go boledišana le makala a ditšhelete go dira gore ditirelo tša ditšhelete di fihlelelege le go rekega go basadi.
tgt_text: sesiwumisele umli nganiselo wokuqinisekisa ukuba ama40 eepesenti ubuncinane bempahla neenkonzo ezithengwa ngamaqumrhu karhulumente kufuneka zithengwe kumashishini wabantu basetyhini.

src_text: sa boraro, re nyaka go kgonthiša gore basadi ba bantši ba na le dithoto tša bohlokwa go swana le naga.
tgt_text: okwesibini, sizakuyinyusa inkxaso yamashishini amancinci aphakathi naphuhlayo (ismmes) wabantu basetyhini neyabantu basetyhini abasebenza kwicandelo elingekho sesikweni okanye abangaphangeliyo.

src_text: go bohlokwa gore basadi e be baholegi ba lenaneo le potlakišitšwego la poelo ya mafase.
tgt_text: oku kuzakuquka nokudibana necandelo lezezimali ukwenza ukuba iinkonzo zezezimali zifikeleleke kwaye zingababizi kakhulu abantu basetyhini.

src_text: go bohlokwa gore go r75 milione ya diboutšhara tšeo di beetšwego kimollo ya covid19 ya kabo ya temo 53% ya baholegi e tla ba basadi ba magaeng.
tgt_text: okwesithathu, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu basetyhini bayakwazi ukufikelela kwiimpahla ezivelisayo ezifana nomhlaba.

src_text: re swanetše go kgonthiša gore basadi ba balemi ba ka gae le ba bannyane ba tšwela pele go amogela thekgo ka morago ga leuba.
tgt_text: kubalulekile ukuba abantu basetyhini babe ngabaxhamli kwinkqubo yohlengahle ngiso lomhlaba ekhawulezileyo.

src_text: sa bone, re nyaka go kgonthiša gore basadi ba šireletšwa go dikgaruru tšeo di ikadilego ka bong mo mošomong.
tgt_text: kubalulekile ukuba kwimali ezizigidi ezingamashumi asixhenxe anesihla nu seerandi zoncedo lwecovid19 ebekelwe bucala igalelo lezolimo ngeevawutsha ama53 eepesenti zabo bangabaxhamli iza kuba ngabantu basetyhini basemaphandleni.

src_text: ka tsela yeo re tla ba re šoma legatong la bosetšhaba le la selete go tumelelano ya kopano ya ilo ka ga dikgaruru le tlhorišo mošomong.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba abantu basetyhini abangamafama okuzi philisa nawemithamo emincinci bayaqhubeka ukufumana inkxaso nasemva kwalo bhubhane.

src_text: go thwe tokologo ga e fiwe, eupša e a tšewa.
tgt_text: okwesine, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu basetyhini bakhuselekile kubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini kwindawo yempangelo.

src_text: tokologo ya basadi ke mantšu fela ao a lego letlakaleng ntle le ge e ka bapetšwa ke boikgafo go tšwa go makala ka moka a setšhaba.
tgt_text: kule meko, siza kusebenza kwinqanaba lesizwe nelommandla ekusondeleni ukuqinisekisa ingqungquthela yombutho wezabasebenzi wezi zwengezizwe engobundlobongela nempathombi kwindawo yempangelo.

src_text: ge re beakanya kagolefsa ya ekonomi ya rena mo tlhohlong ya leuba la coronavirus , re rile re ka se boele moo re bego re le gona pele ga go phulega ga baerase.
tgt_text: kuthiwa inkululeko ayinikezelwa, kodwa iyathathwa.

src_text: re swanetše go aga ekonomi ye bohlokwa ya go fapana le yeo re bego re na le yona yeo, gare ga dilo tše dingwe, e kaonafatšago maemo a bohlokwa a basadi.
tgt_text: ukukhululeka kwabantu basetyhini kusephepheni nje kuphela ngaphandle kokuba kukhatshwa sisibophelelo esivela kuwo onke amacandelo oluntu.

src_text: se se ra gore peeletšo ya rena ka mananeokgoparara ga se ya swanela go thekga fela kaonafatšo ya diintasteri tša gae, eupša le dikgwebo tša basadi.
tgt_text: njengokuba silungiselela ukwakha uqoqosho lwethu ekuqhambukeni kobhubhane wentsholongwane icorona , sathi asinokwazi ukuvela nje sibuyele apho besikho phambi kokuqhambuka kwale ntsholongwane.

src_text: e swanetše go hlola dibaka tša mešomo mo magatong ka moka a peakanyo, go thekga ka ditšhelete, go aga le go hlokomela mananeokgoparara.
tgt_text: kufuneka sakhe uqoqosho olohluke ngokubalulekileyo neliza kuthi, phakathi kokunye, liphucule ngokubonakalayo indawo abakuyo abantu basetyhini.

src_text: ka tekanyo ya go swana ge re oketša thekgo ya mananeo a mešomo ya setšhaba, re swanetše go kgonthiša gore makgarebe kudu ba swanetše go ba bakgathatema.
tgt_text: oku kuthetha ukuthi kutyalomali lwethu kwiziseko ezingundoqo kufuneka singaxhasi nje uphuhliso kumashishini asekhaya kuphela, kodwa sixhase namashishini wabantu basetyhini.

src_text: godimo ga go hwetša letseno, mananeo a a tla ba fa sebaka go hwetša mabokgoni a mangwe le maitemogelo ao a hlokegago go kgatha tema ekonoming ye kgolo.
tgt_text: kufuneka ludalengabomi amathuba emisebenzi yabantu basetyhini kuwo onke amanqanaba okucwangcisa, elezezimali, elokwakha nokulungisa iziseko ezingundoqo.

src_text: le ge e le maikarabelo a mmušo go aba dibaka tša ekonomi go basadi le go hlola tlhako ya go kgontšha go tšwetša pele tekatekano ya bong, mang le mang mo setšhabeng o swanetše go kgatha tema ya gagwe.
tgt_text: ngokomlinganiselo ofanayo, njengokuba sisenyusa iinkqubo zemisebenzi yethu karhulumente, kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba ngokukodwa abantu basetyhini abalulutsha bachongwa njengabathathi nxaxheba.

src_text: dikgwebo di swanetše go thekga dikgwebo tša basadi ka go reka mo go tšona dithoto le ditirelo.
tgt_text: ukongeza kwimivuzo, ezi nkqubo ziza kubabonelela ngethuba lokufumana izakhono ezithile namava adingekayo ukungena kuqoqosho lwesiqhelo.

src_text: di swanetše go thwala basadi ba bantši gomme ba thwale basadi ba bantši maemong a bolaodi.
tgt_text: nangona iluxanduva lukarhulumente ukubonelela abantu basetyhini ngamathuba ezoqoqosho nokudala inkqubosikhokelo yokuxhasa ukuqhubela phambili ukulingana kwezesini, wonke umntu eluntwini udinga ukudlala indima yakhe.

src_text: se se bohlokwa kudu go lebeletšwe gore rekoto ya lekala la praebete mo go kemedi ya bong legatong la taolo e šaletše morago go ya lekala la setšhaba.
tgt_text: abezoshishino kufuneka baxhase amashishini amancinci wabantu basetyhini ekuthengeni iimpahla neenkonzo.

src_text: ye ke taba yeo e tšweletšwago gantši mo dipoledišanong tšeo ke bilego le tšona le mekgatlo ye mmalwa ya dikgwebo tša basadi.
tgt_text: kufuneka baqeshe abantu basetyhini abongezelelweyo baze banyusele abantu basetyhini abongezelelweyo kwizikhundla zezolawulo.

src_text: gore re be le tekatekano re swanetše go fediša setlwaedi sa megolo ya go se lekane go ya ka gore motho ke monna goba mosadi gomme re lefa batho ba ba dirilego mošomo wa go swana ka go lekana go ya ka molao wa tekatekano ya mošomo.
tgt_text: oku kubaluleka ngakumbi xa uqwalasela ukuba imbali yecandelo labucala ekumelweni kwesini kwinqanaba lezikhundla zezolawulo litsala emva kunecandelo likarhu lumente.

src_text: basadi ba swanetšwe go šireletšwa go tlhorišo le kgethologanyo mošomong.
tgt_text: lo ngumba ophakanyiswa izihlandlo ngezihlandlo kuthethathethwano endilubamba nemibutho yezoshishino yabantu basetyhini.

src_text: ke maikarabelo a basepediši ba dinamelwa, balaodi ba diyunibesithi, makgotlataolo a dikolo le mekgatlo ya sedumedi go hlola maemo a a bolokegilego go basadi le basetsana go ka tšea maeto, go ya dikolong le go ya dikerekeng.
tgt_text: ngokufanayo, kufuneka sikuphelisile ukungalingani okugxile kwisini kwimivuzo yamadoda neyabantu basetyhini, size sisebenzise imigomo yokuhlawula umvuzo olinganayo ngomsebenzi ofanayo oqulathwe kumthetho womakulinganwe emsebenzini.

src_text: re swanetše go tšwela pele ka maitapišo a rena a go fediša go nyatšwa ga basadi ke banna, kgethollo ya basadi ke banna le go dira banna dihlogo.
tgt_text: abantu basetyhini kukwafuneka bekhuselwe ekuphathweni kakubi nakucalucalulo emsebenzini.

src_text: ke mekgwa ye yeo e dirago gore go be le kgatelelo ya basadi.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kubanikazi bezothutho, abalawuli beedyunivesithi, iibhodi ezilawulayo ezikolweni kunye nemibutho yezenkolo ukudala iimeko ezilungiselela abantu basetyhini namantombazana ukuba ahambe, afunde aze akhonze ngokukhuselekileyo.

src_text: go tšwa go rena – bobedi banna le basadi – go kgonthiša gore mohola wa mosadi, maemo le dikgopolo ga di fetwe ke tša monna.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubele phambili ngamalinge wethu okukuncothula ukudlisela ngobudoda ngokugqithisileyo, ukuthathela phantsi abantu basetyhini nogonyamelo lwabasetyhini ngamadoda.

src_text: ke maikarabelo a rena bjalo ka batswadi le bokoko le borakgolo go swara le go godiša barwa le barwedi ba rena go swana.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kuthi – sisonke amadoda nabasetyhini – ukungqina ukuba ixabiso lomntu wasetyhini, isikhundla akuso neembono zakhe azikho ngaphantsi kwezomntu oyindoda.

src_text: go tšwa go rena bjalo ka banna go gana le go bolela kgahlanong le ditiragalo tša gbv ge re di bona, le ge e le gore di dirwa ke bagwera ba rena, bopapa ba rena goba bobuti ba rena.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kuthi njengabazali noomawokhulu ukubaphatha nokubakhulisa ngendlela efanayo oonyana neentombi zethu.

src_text: a re beng moloko woo o fedišago kgatelelo ya basadi ka mekgwa ya yona ka moka, mo maphelong a rena.

src_text: se se tlile bjalo ka kimollo go maafrika bo rwa ka moka bao ba ilego ba swanela ke go phela ka fase ga dikiletšo tše tiišeleditšwego letsogo dikgweding tše tlhano tša go feta.
